name: The Chronicles of Quiver Dick
description: The Chronicles of Quiver Dick is a Crude Comedy RPG that has one goal and one goal only: To make you laugh! Play as Quiver Dick, a legendary storyteller and former badass, as he embarks on one of many downright crazy and entirely messed up adventures!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 Mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
